definition: to leave one's post
mythical beast (archaic)
to leave/to part from/to be away from/(in giving distances) from/without (sth)/independent of/one of the Eight Trigrams 八卦[ba1 gua4], symbolizing fire/☲
surname Li
squadron/team/group/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: The arrival of Tévez could hasten the sale of Alan Smith, who has been made surplus to requirements.
sentences.chinese: 特维斯的到来将让史密斯更可能离队。

sentences.english: And if Robbie Keane departs, Harry Redknapp will hope to sign a striker, too.
sentences.chinese: 如果基恩离队，哈里会想再签一名前锋。

sentences.english: The soldier absented himself without leave for three weeks.
sentences.chinese: 那个士兵未请假离队3个星期。

sentences.english: Now they are after a first Olympic medal.
sentences.chinese: 如今他们离队史上第一枚奥运金牌已经不远了。

sentences.english: The soldier absented himself without leave for three weeks.
sentences.chinese: 那个士兵未请假离队三个星期。

definition: to transfer to another club (professional sports)
to renew or extend a contract
to become a member of an alliance or union/to align/to join/participate
transfer fee/signing bonus/sign-on bonus
national security (abbr. for 國家安全|国家安全[guo2 jia1 an1 quan2])/national security act/state security agency
to terminate an agreement/to cancel a contract
club (the organisation or its premises) (loanword)/CL:個|个[ge4]
official announcement (neologism c. 2018)
player whose turn comes next (in a game)/next one/my humble home
Barca (nickname for FC Barcelona)/Baza (town in Grenada, Spain)
the duration of a conference/the period over which a conference (or expo etc) is held/session/the date of a meeting
wing/wing forward
sports team (basketball, soccer, football etc)
TEDA (Tianjin Economic Development Area)
lit. old general/commander-in-chief 將帥|将帅, the equivalent of king in Chinese chess/fig. old-timer/veteran
sports club member/footballer, golfer etc
